text: Martin Fisk (born 28 April 1946 in London) is an English actor. He appeared in several BBC-TV series: *Poldark in 1975 *A Horseman Riding By in 1978, starring Nigel Havers, and was released on DVD in 2004 *Doctor Who: The Leisure Hive (1980) *Miss Marple dramatisation of The Moving Finger in 1985 == References == == External links == * Category:English male television actors Category:1946 births Category:20th-century English male actors Category:Male actors from London Category:Living people
title: Martin Fisk
